entry.title: $2500 // doorman building! prime Yorkville! King size bedroom! no credit check
entry.content:
LARGE one bedroom in the upper east side. Fourth floor of a well maintained building that features a part time doorman, elevator, andlaundry room. Large bright living space/open kitchen!! KING sized bedroom with large closets and A/C units in each room, full kitchen with dishwasher. All new appliances, and renovated bathrooms! Great deal on a large one bedroom in the upper east side. No credit check, no app fee! Heat, hot water, gas included! no pets allowed!

NO BROKER FEE
Please respond with contact info!!

entry.title: $2600 // Prime upper east side, gut renovated, 1 bedroom, quiet, no fee
entry.content:
Gut renovated one bedroom featuring:
- hardwood floors,
- decorative fireplace,
- exposed brick wall,
- loft like 9.5 ft high ceilings,
- brand new appliances, including a dishwasher,
- ample storage with 2 closets,
- windowed bathroom.
- pin drop quiet, faces the back,
- very nice super lives in the building.

Location, location, on east 77th street and 2nd avenue, close to the Q and 6 trains, M15 Express bus and all shopping.

By owner, no brokers fee, no brokers please.
$2,600 or best offer, first month, last month and security deposit, one year lease subject to management company approval, good credit a must.
$250 application fee, $75 credit check fee, and $500 in fee ($400 gets refunded to you after you move in).
